genresAdvancedInfo.name: igbo worship
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Igbo worship music is a genre of music that is sung in Igbo language during Christian religious services. It is characterized by its use of gospel rhythms and melodies, and is often accompanied by choir singing and instrumental accompaniment. The music is intended to inspire worship and praise to God, and is deeply rooted in the Christian faith. It is a popular genre in Nigeria and beyond, and is enjoyed by both Christians and non-Christians alike.
